[Home](./index.md) &gt; [@microsoft/teamsfx](./teamsfx.md) &gt; [TeamsFx](./teamsfx.teamsfx.md) &gt; [getCredential](./teamsfx.teamsfx.getcredential.md)

## TeamsFx.getCredential() method

Credential instance according to identity type choice.

**Signature:**

```typescript
getCredential(): TokenCredential;
```
**Returns:**

TokenCredential

instance implements TokenCredential interface.

## Remarks

If user identity is chose, will return [TeamsUserCredential](./teamsfx.teamsusercredential.md) in browser environment and [OnBehalfOfUserCredential](./teamsfx.onbehalfofusercredential.md) in NodeJS. If app identity is chose, will return [AppCredential](./teamsfx.appcredential.md)<!-- -->.
